availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucretia Jordan Overstreet in Mercer County, Kentucky, in February 1838. Father of Margarett Overstreet, Sochie Overstreet, Thomas Overstreet, John Overstreet, Lucy Overstreet, Jacob Overstreet, Malinda Jane Overstreet, Sarah Overstreet, and Francis A. Overstreet. Farmer in Mercer County in 1850. Farmer in Anderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 304B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 543.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994027, Mercer County Births, p. 4.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191856.
